```{r echo=FALSE}
library(leaflet)

### creating a random icon
NatIcon <- makeIcon(
    iconUrl = "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/e/e0/Check_green_icon.svg",
    iconWidth = 31*215/230, 
    iconHeight=31,
    iconAnchorX=31*215/230/2,
    iconAnchorY = 16
)


### creando los popups
NatPopups <- sample(c("Store A", "Store B", "Store C"),30,replace = TRUE)


### latitud and longitud
NatLatLong <- data.frame(lat=runif(50,min=6.15,max=6.35), 
                 lng=runif(50,min=-75.63,max=-75.53))  

### mapa
NatLatLong %>% 
    leaflet() %>% 
    addTiles() %>% 
    addMarkers(icon=NatIcon, 
               popup=NatPopups,
               clusterOptions = markerClusterOptions())

```
